attributes.action: adopt a tougher stance on mass media ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wrong for any person or organisation to control such a large proportion of the media that they are in a position to undermine the democratic foundations of our country by exerting undue influence on government policy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
